001package reversi;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Optional;
006
007public class Game extends Object {
008    private String name;
009    private List<Player> players;
010    private Table table;
011    private Integer playerIndex;
012
013    public Game(String name) {
014        Integer maxColumn = 8;
015        Integer maxRow = 8;
016        this.name = name;
017        this.players = new ArrayList<>();
018        this.table = new Table(maxColumn, maxRow);
019        this.playerIndex = 0;
020        initialize();
021        return;
022    }
023
024    public void initialize() {
025        this.players.add(new Computer(1, table));
026        // this.players.add(new Player(1, "a", table));
027        // this.players.add(new Computer(2, table));
028        this.players.add(new Player(2, "b", table));
029        return;
030    }
031
032    public void prepare() {
033        Integer aMaxColumn = table.getMaxColumn();
034        Integer aMaxRow = table.getMaxRow();
035        Integer aColumn = aMaxColumn / 2;
036        Integer aRow = aMaxRow / 2;
037        table.getGrid(aColumn, aRow).placePiece(players.get(0).getPiece());
038        table.getGrid(aColumn - 1, aRow - 1).placePiece(players.get(0).getPiece());
039        table.getGrid(aColumn - 1, aRow).placePiece(players.get(1).getPiece());
040        table.getGrid(aColumn, aRow - 1).placePiece(players.get(1).getPiece());
041        return;
042    }
043
044    public void placePiece(Integer aColumn, Integer aRow) {
045        Player aPlayer = getCurrentPlayer();
046        if (table.isPlacePiece(aPlayer, aColumn, aRow)) {
047            aPlayer.placePiece(aColumn, aRow);
048            nextPlayerIndex();
049        }
050        return;
051    }
052
053    public void computerPlacePiece() {
054        Computer aComputer = (Computer) getCurrentPlayer();
055        if (isPlayerPlacePiece(aComputer)) {
056            aComputer.placePiece();
057        }
058        nextPlayerIndex();
059        return;
060    }
061
062    public Boolean isPlayerPlacePiece(Player aPlayer) {
063        List<Grid> grids = table.getGrids();
064        for (Grid aGrid : grids) {
065            if (table.isPlacePiece(aPlayer, aGrid))
066                return true;
067        }
068        return false;
069    }
070
071    public void nextPlayerIndex() {
072        playerIndex = (playerIndex + 1) % players.size();
073        return;
074    }
075
076    public void newTable() {
077        Integer maxColumn = table.getMaxColumn() + 1;
078        Integer maxRow = table.getMaxRow() + 1;
079        table = new Table(maxColumn, maxRow);
080        players.forEach(item -> item.setTable(table));
081        return;
082    }
083
084    public void addPlayer() {
085        Integer index = players.size() + 1;
086        players.add(new Computer(index, table));
087        return;
088    }
089
090    public Boolean isEnd() {
091        if (table.getEmpty().getNumber() == 0)
092            return true;
093        Integer current = playerIndex;
094        while (!isPlayerPlacePiece(getCurrentPlayer())) {
095            nextPlayerIndex();
096            if (playerIndex == current)
097                return true;
098        }
099        return false;
100    }
101
102    public void winPlayerIndex() {
103        List<Integer> aList = new ArrayList<>();
104        players.forEach(item -> aList.add(item.getNumber()));
105        Optional<Integer> max = aList.stream().max(Integer::compareTo);
106        playerIndex = aList.indexOf(max.get());
107        return;
108    }
109
110    public Player getCurrentPlayer() {
111        return players.get(playerIndex);
112    }
113
114    public Player getWinPlayer() {
115        winPlayerIndex();
116        return getCurrentPlayer();
117    }
118
119    public Player getIndexPlayer(Integer index) {
120        return players.get(index);
121    }
122
123    public String getName() {
124        return name;
125    }
126
127    public Table getTable() {
128        return table;
129    }
130
131    public List<Player> getPlayers() {
132        return players;
133    }
134}
